analysis.key_quote: This Rule opens the door to tyrannical removal of civil servants at the whim of the President, who (as the Rule states) is proposed to have ultimate authority regarding which staff are moved into the at-will reclassification.
analysis.rationale: The comment expresses strong opposition to the rule, emphasizing concerns about due process and the potential for politicization of civil service positions, which aligns with the themes of protecting employee rights and maintaining a nonpartisan civil service.
